view

Interface IView2ModelAdapter<TStrategyDropListItem,TPaintDropListItem>


  • public interface IView2ModelAdapter<TStrategyDropListItem,TPaintDropListItem>
    The interface of the adapter from the view to the model that enables the view to talk to the model.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IView2ModelAdapter<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> NULL_OBJECT
      No-op singleton implementation of IView2ModelAdapter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TPaintDropListItem addPaintStrategy(java.lang.String classname) 
      TStrategyDropListItem addStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
      Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
      TStrategyDropListItem combineStrategies(TStrategyDropListItem selectedItem1, TStrategyDropListItem selectedItem2)
      Return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
      void makeBall(TStrategyDropListItem selectedItem, TPaintDropListItem selectedItem2)
      Make a ball with the selected short strategy name.
      void makeSwitcherBall(TPaintDropListItem selectedItem)
      Make a ball whose strategy could be switched.
      void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Instructs the model to paint each of its component observers.
      void reset()
      Instructs the model to delete all of its component objects.

      • paint

        void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Instructs the model to paint each of its component observers.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object used to help paint the models

      • addStrategy

        TStrategyDropListItem addStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
        Take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
        Parameters:
        classname - The shortened class name of the desired strategy
        Returns:
        Something to put onto both the drop lists.

      • combineStrategies

        TStrategyDropListItem combineStrategies(TStrategyDropListItem selectedItem1,
                                        TStrategyDropListItem selectedItem2)
        Return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem1 - An object from one drop list
        selectedItem2 - An object from the other drop list
        Returns:
        An object to put back on both lists.

      • switchStrategy

        void switchStrategy(TStrategyDropListItem selectedItem)
        Switch all the switcher balls to the given strategy.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem - A shorten class name for the desired strategy
